name: Overaged
description:
Overaged is a two-player voxel-based game in which players take the roles of two handsome old characters fighting each other to get an inheritance. 

The goal is to open the chest containing the inheritance; a mythical Katana that spreads the devil’s corruption all around.

There are two possible win conditions:

- Opening the chest containing the katana

- Killing the other player

The game will take place in a cozy yet modern little house in the suburbs with several incongruous objects spawning randomly that you could use to kill your opponent.
In Overaged players will find a new and unique experience. The game is fast, and pretty nervous. There is a huge feeling of joy when you kill your opponent or get the Katana and that excitement can carry through for the rest of the day.

Features:

  • 3D game
  • 2 Local Player
  • Free game
  • Fast party game
  • Versus game
  • Isometric

Our team : 

  • Game Producer : BEHBAHANI NIA Iman - FURMANOV Artem
  • Game Designer :  BURY Aurore - TISSERAND Clément
  • Game Artist :  THERET Quentin - ALOTOUNOU Amir - ARVIS Pierre
  • Game Developer :  FILIPOVICH Maxime - CHAUVIN Cédric - BARNEOUD-CHAPELIER Bastien
  • Sound Designer :  BRICLOT Martial
